name: [Demo] Grave Advice
description:
What's more 'cozy' than the chance to be given comfort and advice in your time of need? 

Sometimes, by the most unexpected of souls... Do you find yourself seeking a place of peace? Mental, or Physical- 

Don't pass up this chance of guidance; many are willing to die for it. Morally grey advice provided for your every need. But don't worry it always works out in the end- right?

We welcome you to play a game where you take the role of a spirit, handing out guidance to those who stop by, in need of a friend. This game is currently a Demo, with Art and Design credited to Helltrskelter, and writing and coding  credited to SweetSharkSoup. 

Will you make the right choice, and give the correct advice to get the cozy end? Or see the consequences of your questionable help in the cold one?'

Initially created during Winter MelonJam 2022, within 48 hours. (#wintermelonjam2022)

Novice category
